title: Please help
content:
Can you please let me know what this font is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724120517/http:/typophile.com/files/image_146.jpg) | 487.17 KB |
author: Primehunter

comments.content: A bit reworked (mainly squooshed and manually slanted) but [Egyptienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724120517/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Egyptienne) or [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724120517/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/clarendon) might do the job decently.
